## Leaflet Map

Creating a Map that illustrates the Eiffel Tour

```{r}
library(leaflet)
```


```{r}
my_map <- leaflet() %>%
addTiles()
my_map

```


```{r}
EiffelTour <- c("<a href= 'http://www.toureiffel.paris' >Eiffel Tour</a>")
leaflet() %>%
addTiles() %>%
addMarkers(lat=48.858053, lng=2.294289, popup = EiffelTour)

```
